title: Remove specific certificate from CertificatesFolder grid

requirements.summary: Remove the certificate at grid position div[5] from the CertificatesFolder component
acceptanceCriteria: The certificate at the specified XPath position /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[8]/div[1]/div[2]/div[5]/div[1]/div[1] is removed from the staticCertificates array
The grid layout adjusts automatically to fill the gap
No broken image references remain in the component

file_operations.description: Review the component to identify the certificate at grid position div[5] (the 5th item in the grid). If using a staticCertificates array, remove the entry at index 4 (zero-based). If certificates are rendered from uploaded data, identify and remove the specific certificate reference that appears at the 5th grid position. Ensure the grid layout remains intact and no broken image references remain.

requirements.summary: Delete the certificate image file from frontend/public/assets/ that was displayed at grid position div[5]
acceptanceCriteria: The image file is completely removed from the assets directory
No orphaned files remain in the project

file_operations.description: Delete the specific certificate image file that corresponds to the 5th grid position in the CertificatesFolder component. The exact filename must be identified by reviewing the CertificatesFolder.tsx component code to determine which asset file is referenced at that position.
